First Post

I'm a developer/data journalist. I write bits of code that collects and analyses data and other bits that helps tell a clear story about that data. Sometimes I write bots that collect and yell and interact.

I am a technologist working with both software and hardware.

Sometimes I teach others.

I don't write nearly enough.
